title: How can I subscribe to Unity's RSS feed?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I would like to be kept updated regularly on the latest news from Unity.
  • I am too busy to spend time searching Unity's blogs. 
  • I would like to subscribe to the RSS feed.

sections.title: Cause
content: It can be difficult to keep up with all the news surrounding Unity updates especially as the games industry moves so quickly.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can subscribe to Unity's RSS feed here. Click "Subscribe to RSS" at the top of the page.
